Package doa.engine.scene

Class DoaPhysics

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.scene.DoaPhysics
public final class DoaPhysics extends Object
Physics engine. Config only, never call the methods of this class!
Since:
DoaEngine 3.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc

  • Field Details

    • Gravity

      @NotNull public static @NotNull DoaVector Gravity
      Global gravity vector. Default value is 0 vector. This value is shared between scenes.

    • PPM

      public static float PPM
      Pixel per meter factor. Default value is 64ppm. 64 pixels = 1 meter. This value is shared between scenes. This value should not vary.

    • VelocityIterations

      public static int VelocityIterations
      Number of iterations in the velocity constraint solver. Default value is 8. Must be bigger than 0. Higher values allow more precise simulations at the cost of performance. This value is shared between scenes. This value should not vary.

    • PositionIterations

      public static int PositionIterations
      Number of iterations in the position constraint solver. Default value is 3. Must be bigger than 0. Higher values allow more precise simulations at the cost of performance. This value is shared between scenes. This value should not vary.
